SNAct1:BossGlacies.NAME: Glacies
SNAct1:BossGlacies.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deals additional damage equal to the amount of Block on this creature.

SNAct1:BossIceBreath.NAME: Ice Breath
SNAct1:BossIceBreath.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Apply !M! *Chill *Defense for !SNAct1:SecondMagic! turns to ALL enemies.

SNAct1:BossLightBreath.NAME: Light Breath
SNAct1:BossLightBreath.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain !B Block and !M! Strength.

SNAct1:BossNinisGrace.NAME: Ninis' Grace
SNAct1:BossNinisGrace.DESCRIPTION: This creature increases the next !M! instance(s) of Block it gains by !SNAct1:SecondMagic!%.

SNAct1:BossRallyDefense.NAME: Rally Defense
SNAct1:BossRallyDefense.DESCRIPTION: This creature and all allies gain !B! Block.

SNAct1:BossVisionsOfArcadia.NAME: Visions of Arcadia
SNAct1:BossVisionsOfArcadia.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! *Arcadian *Vision for !SNAct1:SecondMagic! turns to this creature and all allies.
